system.description:
Effect: The targeted Pokémon undergoes Mega Evolution. The Spent PP is deducted from the target.
May only be used by either a Pokémon holding a <Species> matched Mega Stone or its partner, holding a Key Stone. The Pokémon may use this with Range "Self" on its Activation if the partner is within 50m, while the partner may use this Action as a Command Action.

actions.name: Mega Evolve!
actions.description:
Effect: The targeted Pokémon undergoes Mega Evolution. The Spent PP is deducted from the target.
May only be used by either a Pokémon holding a <Species> matched Mega Stone or its partner, holding a Key Stone. The Pokémon may use this with Range "Self" on its Activation if the partner is within 50m, while the partner may use this Action as a Command Action.
